Reviews.Title: “take the upgrade option!”
Reviews.Author: lauren28Sydney
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 days visiting friends booked hotelclubcom paid thee upgrade checked normal queen day requested upgraded staff tried tell reservation cancelled mistake apology upgrade time original stuffy didnt view city bed rolled sit sheets upgraded roo bright nice view rockies aa flat screen tv sheets ironed bed didnt move quality extra week upgrade microwave mini fridge free breakfast pretty poor day 9am run wouldnt recommend interet connection close downtown 2 bus rides 1 st downtown takes 15 mins st walk 1 bus amtrak via rail greyhound stattion hotel door nice cafes shops near hotel bar prince edward st live bands play shopping centre nearby pretty safe walked late own bus stop late night nights wouldnt recommend eating hotel bar pretty average food walk road heaps food stay downtown recommend looking elsewhere fussed cheaper price recommend lot cheaper downtown hojo

Reviews.Title: “great budget hotel, close to city centre”

Reviews.Content: howard johnson plaza hotel outskirts downtown vancouver fortnight cost 600 gbp value friendly service excellent maid service friendly helpful staff half hour walk heart downtown vancouver bus service door ten minutes 5 minute walk skytrain waterfront minutes coming vancouver definitely time 5 stars
